channel.title: Shut down computer command in command prompt?
channel.description:
whats the Shut down computer command in command prompt?
not to infinitly shut it down or loop shut down just to shut it down once
thanks

item.title: Shut down computer command in command prompt?
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

[quote=“poopy4231, post:1, topic:35031”]whats the Shut down computer command in command prompt?

not to infinitly shut it down or loop shut down just to shut it down once

thanks[/quote]

Sorry for there “not niceness”

For onetime shutdown, in command prompt, type “shutdown -s”

For restart, “shutdown -r”

If you want to put in a message, "shutdown -s -c “your message including the “”'s”

Read full topic
item.source: Shut down computer command in command prompt?
